abort.account_already_exists: Account with given username already exists

user.title: Pandora Account Authentication
user.description:
Enter your credentials for your Pandora Online account.

These are the username and password you might be using to log onto https://p-on.ru/ or https://pro.p-on.ru/ websites, or "Pandora Pro" (iOS) or "Pandora Online" (Android) applications.
